attributes.action: Telephone confirmation of online fast food orders to prevent prank orders .
attributes.background: On several occasions I have received prank Pizza Deliveries from my local Dominos which I had not ordered . I want Parliament to legislate to require Fast Food outlets to telephone to confirm Online Orders .

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about your experience, but we can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about how to take orders are a matter for individual businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.
